xbx360.name: Fallout 3
xbx360.description: Set in a post-apocalyptic Washington D.C., Fallout 3 offers an expansive open-world experience where players navigate the Wasteland, making choices that influence the game's outcome.

xbx360.name: Diablo III
xbx360.description: A dark fantasy action RPG where you fight hordes of demons and collect powerful loot. Includes the Reaper of Souls expansion and supports solo or cooperative play.

xbx360.name: Halo 4
xbx360.description: Continuing the saga of Master Chief, Halo 4 introduces new enemies and delves deeper into the Forerunner lore, offering both single-player and multiplayer experiences.

xbx360.name: Gears of War 2
xbx360.description: Gears of War 2 enhances the cover-based shooting mechanics of its predecessor, introducing new multiplayer modes and a gripping storyline amidst intense action.

xbx360.name: NBA 2K12
xbx360.description: NBA 2K12 offers basketball enthusiasts a chance to play as legendary figures, featuring the 'NBA's Greatest' mode with detailed recreations of historic matchups.

xbx360.name: Payday 2
xbx360.description: In Payday 2, players team up for high-stakes heists, requiring coordination and strategy to execute missions and evade law enforcement.

xbx360.name: Doom 3
xbx360.description: Doom 3 reimagines the classic franchise with a focus on horror and atmosphere, as players battle demonic forces on Mars.

xbx360.name: Blue Dragon
xbx360.description: A traditional Japanese RPG with turn-based combat and shadow-summoning powers. Created by Final Fantasy's Hironobu Sakaguchi with art by Akira Toriyama.

xbx360.name: NASCAR 08
xbx360.description: Race your way to the top in the official NASCAR simulation. Featuring realistic driving physics, authentic tracks, and team management, NASCAR 08 puts you in the driver's seat of the stock car world.

xbx360.name: Left 4 Dead 2
xbx360.description: Left 4 Dead emphasizes cooperative gameplay, as players team up to survive against relentless zombie hordes in various scenarios.

xbx360.name: Darkstar One
xbx360.description: Pilot the customizable Darkstar One spacecraft, exploring over 300 solar systems and engaging in space combat and trading.

xbx360.name: Tomb Raider
xbx360.description: Experience the origin story of Lara Croft, as she transforms from a young survivor to a seasoned adventurer on a mysterious island.

xbx360.name: The Darkness II
xbx360.description: Play as Jackie Estacado, a mobster wielding supernatural powers. Experience intense combat and a unique cel-shaded art style in this brutal FPS.

xbx360.name: Mafia II
xbx360.description: Step into the shoes of Vito Scaletta, navigating the criminal underworld of a post-war American city in this narrative-driven game.

xbx360.name: Mass Effect
xbx360.description: As Commander Shepard, assemble a team to save the galaxy from an ancient threat, making choices that impact the story's outcome.

xbx360.name: Splinter Cell: Conviction
xbx360.description: Sam Fisher returns in a fast-paced, cinematic stealth game. Use gadgets, interrogation, and the Mark & Execute system to eliminate targets silently.

xbx360.name: Alan Wake
xbx360.description: A writer trapped in a nightmare must uncover the mystery behind his missing wife. Use light as your weapon in this story-driven psychological thriller.

xbx360.name: Operation Flashpoint
xbx360.description: A realistic military FPS focused on tactical squad gameplay. Plan, flank, and command your fireteam in a large-scale open battlefield.

xbx360.name: Rage
xbx360.description: In a post-apocalyptic world, players fight against mutants and hostile factions using a mix of shooting and vehicular combat.

xbx360.name: Overlord
xbx360.description: Command an army of minions to conquer lands and defeat heroes, embracing your role as the dark overlord.

xbx360.name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare
xbx360.description: Modern Warfare revolutionizes the FPS genre with its contemporary setting, intense single-player campaign, and robust multiplayer modes.

xbx360.name: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow 2
xbx360.description: Play as Dracula in a journey that spans both medieval and modern worlds, battling enemies with a variety of weapons and abilities.

xbx360.name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
xbx360.description: Skyrim offers an expansive open world filled with quests, dragons, and rich lore, allowing players to forge their own path in the land of Tamriel.

xbx360.name: Assassin Creed: Revelations
xbx360.description: Ezio's final chapter leads him to Constantinople, where he uncovers secrets of the Assassins. Use stealth, gadgets, and the new hookblade in a richly detailed world.

ps3.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops
ps3.description: Engage in covert operations during the Cold War era, featuring a gripping single-player campaign and robust multiplayer modes.

ps3.name: Street Fighter X Tekken
ps3.description: A crossover fighting game that brings together characters from Street Fighter and Tekken in tag team battles.

ps3.name: BioShock 2
ps3.description: Return to the underwater city of Rapture as a Big Daddy in this atmospheric shooter.

ps3.name: Max Payne 3
ps3.description: Follow Max Payne's journey through Brazil in a gritty tale of corruption and vengeance.

ps3.name: Borderlands 2
ps3.description: Loot and shoot your way through Pandora with a cast of quirky characters and endless weapons.

ps3.name: Infamous
ps3.description: Play as Cole MacGrath, a bike messenger turned superhuman, navigating a city in chaos.

ps3.name: Armored Core V
ps3.description: Pilot customizable mechs in tactical battles across a dystopian world.

ps3.name: Assassin's Creed II
ps3.description: Explore Renaissance Italy as Ezio Auditore, unraveling a tale of family, power, and vengeance.

ps3.name: FIFA 13
ps3.description: Experience the world's game with improved AI and realistic gameplay.

ps3.name: Dark Sector
ps3.description: Wield the deadly glaive as Hayden Tenno, battling bio-mechanical foes in a dark world.

ps3.name: Super Street Fighter IV
ps3.description: An enhanced version of Street Fighter IV with new characters and features.

ps3.name: Gran Turismo 5
ps3.description: Experience realistic racing with a vast selection of cars and tracks.

ps3.name: Dead Rising 2
ps3.description: Survive a zombie outbreak in Fortune City using an array of improvised weapons.

ps3.name: R.U.S.E.
ps3.description: Deceive your enemies and lead your army to victory in this World War II strategy game.

ps3.name: Dead Island
ps3.description: Fight for survival on a zombie-infested tropical island.

ps3.name: Fight Night Round 3
ps3.description: Step into the ring with boxing legends in this realistic fighting game.

ps3.name: Watch Dogs
ps3.description: Hack the city of Chicago as Aiden Pearce in a quest for revenge.

ps3.name: Just Cause 2
ps3.description: Cause chaos in the open-world island of Panau with explosive action.

ps3.name: Hitman: Absolution
ps3.description: Take on the role of Agent 47 in a mission of personal redemption.

ps3.name: Prince of Persia
ps3.description: Embark on a journey to cleanse the world of corruption with acrobatic prowess.

ps3.name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit
ps3.description: Experience high-speed chases as both racer and cop in an open-world environment.

ps3.name: Star Wars: The Force Unleashed
ps3.description: Unleash the power of the Force as Darth Vader's secret apprentice.

ps3.name: WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2009
ps3.description: Enter the ring with WWE superstars in this wrestling simulation.

ps3.name: Ghostbusters: The Video Game
ps3.description: Join the original Ghostbusters team in a new adventure to save New York City.
